column1: The Purple Pig////Maybe you show up at the restaurant and theres a 45 minute wait time so you decide to go to the store next door and find yourself the perfect pair of pants and just as you are trying them out you get notified that your table is ready? And
column2: you finally make it to the restaurant sans the perfect set of pants sweating profusely from the short jog outside only to realize that your table is positioned at a angle from the sun perfectly oriented to give you first degree burns.
